DOC.brief_summary: Patients with diabetes who are counseled by a peer coach (another patient with diabetes) will have improved glycemic control compared with usual care patients.
DOC.brief_title: Peer Coaching for Low-Income Patients With Diabetes in Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: Peer coaches have controlled diabetes, patient study subjects have poorly controlled diabetes.
DOC.criteria: Diabetes with most recent HbA1c 8 or above in past 6 months. Dementia, Life expectancy less than 6 months, Inability to speak English or Spanish.
